issue.title: [Python][FlightRPC] Log uncaught exceptions by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15909](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15909). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a super common pitfall and it would be nice to just handle this for users. That said given some methods are "async" (e.g. DoGet) there are a few places we'd have to do this logging/not all things will get fully caught, but we should at least get the basics.
